Content: _looks_ well not like there's a lot to review_ of what's there_ imo it looks fine_ everything is nicely separated into little sections of related function calls
this is probably bad practice_ but i'd import `import javafx.scene.shape.*;` instead
nah it's got a good reason
firstly everything would be super slow if you imported hundreds if not thousands of classes
secondly you probably didn't want anything from the child namespaces anyway
it might be a thing you want in a scripting language_ but definitely not java (btw_ scripting languages don't allow this either)
